channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10853] Create ExplainTask in ATS hook through ExplainWork
item.description: Right now ExplainTask is created directly. That's fragile and can lead to stuff like: HIVE-10829
item.summary: Create ExplainTask in ATS hook through ExplainWork

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Minor nit: would be nice to comment all the bool flags in setting up an instance of explain work. +1
